content.body: Michael Ficarra: are you up for presenting on our behalf at plenary?
content.formatted_body: Michael Ficarra: are you up for presenting on our behalf at plenary?

content.body: I haven't been able to attend the last few meetings, so you should probably ask someone else

any volunteers?  our only updates are the publication of the vulnerability disclosure policy (which incorporated the feedback from previous plenary) and enabling GH private vulnerability reporting for the org
I'll pencil myself in for now
